title: From particle vel. to accel, speed, and position

content.question: (a) Find the acceleration of the particle at time \(t=5.1\).

frqParts.text: (a) Find the acceleration of the particle at time \(t=5.1\).
(b) Find all values of \(t\) in the interval \(0\le t\le2\) for which the speed of the particle is 1.
(c) Find the position of the particle at time \(t=4\). Is the particle moving toward the origin or away from the origin at time \(t=4\) ? Justify your answer.
(d) During the time interval \(0 < t\le4\), does the particle return to its initial position? Give a reason for your answer.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
